entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Vernon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount possibly reaching 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
